channel.title: Petition on making the RuneScape Classic board merged with the RuneScape 2 board
channel.description:
I would like to to make a petition of merging the RuneScape Classic board with the RuneScape 2 board to make it a general RSPS board. With RuneScape Classic on the utmost bottom of the website, it denotes that Classic is not 'well-deserved' to be in a higher level. In order to allow both sides to be promoted, an action must be taken place at a high priority. Think of it like this, if we switched both of the boards, I'm pretty sure RuneScape Classic would get more views. This is also unfair to the other side. Solution? Merge both boards! Both boards are promoted this way. Best of both worlds. Happy ending.
If you support this, say something that denotes supportiveness such as, "Support!"
People who support this so far: [ol][li]Arham 4[/li] [li]i am infamy[/li][/ol]

item.title: Petition on making the RuneScape Classic board merged with the RuneScape 2 board
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Lin:

I think this is the worst idea I’ve seen suggested so far.

Read full topic

item.title: Petition on making the RuneScape Classic board merged with the RuneScape 2 board
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:17, topic:477947”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=596144.msg4197622#msg4197622 date=1357752429]

I’d rather see the RS2 board split from everything 600+.

[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Petition on making the RuneScape Classic board merged with the RuneScape 2 board

item.title: Petition on making the RuneScape Classic board merged with the RuneScape 2 board
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

We saw no additional views or popularity change when we moved the RS2 boards above all of general, so we moved them back, why would this be any different?
In my opinion, you’re either into the classic scene or you’re not, I tend to avoid those sections simply because I’m not interested in it, nothing to do with the arrangement of the boards whatsoever.

Read full topic

item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Thirteen votes for “No”, and one vote for “Yes”. Nobody voted for the median. I think you can close this Poll now.

As if this poll even matters. MITB would never go for this.

item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

RSC boards are unique in the sense that it is a community within a community. Let them stay that way.

Than again, I’ve been biased about those boards since I was a mod since every moderation act I performed resulted in flame from that community looool.

Read full topic
